00048 TableFile::TableFile(char delim, char comment, bool useRowNames, bool useColNames) 
00049   : m_Delim(delim), m_Comment(comment), m_UseRowNames(useRowNames), m_UseColNames(useColNames) {
00050 }

00055 TableFile::~TableFile() {
00056   unsigned int i;
00057   for(i = 0; i < m_MemToFree.size(); i++) {
00058     char *p = m_MemToFree[i];
00059     delete [] p;
00060   }
00061 }

00068 unsigned int TableFile::colIndex(const std::string& colName) {
00069   assert(colName!="");
00070   TMapConstIter iter = m_ColNameMap.find(colName);
00071   if(iter == m_ColNameMap.end())
00072     return npos;
00073 
00074   return iter->second;
00075 }

00082 unsigned int TableFile::rowIndex(const std::string& rowName) {
00083   assert(rowName!="");
00084   TMapConstIter iter = m_RowNameMap.find(rowName);
00085   if(iter == m_RowNameMap.end())
00086     return npos;
00087 
00088   return iter->second;
00089 }

00096 bool TableFile::open(const std::string& fileName) {
00097   std::vector<string> requiredCols;
00098   return open(fileName, requiredCols);
00099 }

00107 bool TableFile::open(const std::string& fileName, const std::vector<std::string> &requiredCols) {
00108   assert(fileName!="");
00109   vector<bool> found(requiredCols.size());
00110   vector<string> words;
00111   char *name = NULL;
00112   int rowOffset = 0;
00113   unsigned int i = 0;
00114   int count = 0;
00115   RowFile rf;
00116   rowOffset = (m_UseRowNames == true) ? 1 : 0;
00117   rf.open(fileName.c_str());
00118 
00119   /* Read in any header. */
00120   rf.readHeader(rf, m_Header, m_HeaderLines);
00121 
00122   /* Read in column names. */
00123   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00124     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00125 
00126   if(m_UseColNames) {
00127     /* Read in the column header names. */
00128     for(i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00129       name = Util::cloneString(words[i].c_str());
00130       //m_MemToFree.push_back(name);
00131       
00132       /* Was this a required column? */
00133       for(unsigned int requiredIx = 0; requiredIx < requiredCols.size(); requiredIx++) {
00134         if(requiredCols[requiredIx] == name) {
00135           found[requiredIx] = true;
00136         }
00137       }
00138       if(m_ColNameMap.find(name) != m_ColNameMap.end())
00139         Verbose::out(1, "Warning: Duplicate name: " + words[i] + 
00140                      " in column headers from file: " + Util::fileRoot(fileName));
00141       m_ColNameMap[name] = m_ColNames.size();
00142       m_ColNames.push_back(words[i]);
00143     }
00144     /* Check to make sure we found the required column names. */
00145     for(unsigned int requiredIx = 0; requiredIx < requiredCols.size(); requiredIx++) {
00146       if(found[requiredIx] == false) {
00147         Err::errAbort("Didn't find required column name: '" + 
00148                         requiredCols[requiredIx] + "' in file: " + fileName);
00149       }
00150     }
00151   }
00152   else {
00153     rf.reuseLine();
00154   }
00155   /* Read in each row. */
00156   while(rf.nextRow(words)) {
00157     string nameSpoof;
00158     // Spoof the column names if not being read.
00159     if(!m_UseColNames && m_Data.empty()) {
00160       unsigned int colIx = 0;
00161       if(m_UseRowNames)
00162         colIx = 1;
00163       for(colIx = colIx; colIx < words.size(); colIx++) {
00164         m_ColNames.push_back(ToStr(colIx));
00165       }
00166     }
00167     if(words.size() - rowOffset != m_ColNames.size()) 
00168       Err::errAbort("Expecting " + ToStr(m_ColNames.size()) + " words but got " +
00169                       ToStr(words.size() - rowOffset) + " at line " + 
00170                       ToStr(rf.getCurrentLineNumber()));
00171 
00172     assert(words.size() > 0);
00173     if(m_UseRowNames) {
00174       name = Util::cloneString(words[0].c_str());
00175     }
00176     else {
00177       nameSpoof = Convert::toString(count);
00178       name = Util::cloneString(nameSpoof.c_str());
00179     }
00180     m_MemToFree.push_back(name);      
00181     if(m_RowNameMap.find(name) != m_RowNameMap.end())
00182       Err::errAbort("Duplicate name: " + words[0] + " in row names.");
00183     m_RowNameMap[name] = m_Data.size();
00184     if(m_UseRowNames) {
00185       m_RowNames.push_back(words[0]);
00186       words.erase(words.begin());
00187     }
00188     else {
00189       m_RowNames.push_back(nameSpoof);
00190     }
00191     m_Data.push_back( words  );
00192     count++;
00193   }
00194   rf.close();
00195   return true;
00196 }

00204 void TableFile::writeVector(std::ostream &out, std::vector<std::string> data, char delim) {
00205   unsigned int i = 0;
00206   for( i = 0; i < data.size() - 1; i++) {
00207     out << data[i];
00208     out.put(delim);
00209   }
00210   if(data.size() > 0)
00211     out << data[data.size()-1];
00212   out << endl;
00213 }
00214                  
00220 bool TableFile::write(const std::string& fileName) {
00221   assert(fileName!="");
00222   if(m_Data.empty()) 
00223     Err::errAbort("TableFile::write() - No data do write.");
00224   ofstream out(fileName.c_str());
00225   unsigned int i = 0;
00226   RowFile::writeHeader(out, m_HeaderLines);
00227   writeVector(out, m_ColNames, m_Delim);
00228   for(i = 0; i < m_Data.size(); i++) {
00229     out << m_RowNames[i];
00230     out.put(m_Delim);
00231     writeVector(out, m_Data[i], m_Delim);
00232   }
00233   return true;
00234 }

00247 bool TableFile::columnFromFile(const std::string& fileName,
00248                                std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00249                                const std::string& colName, unsigned int skipCols, bool unique) {
00250   RowFile rf;
00251   vector<string> words;
00252   rf.open(fileName.c_str());
00253   unsigned int colIx = npos;
00254 
00255   /* Skip rows. */
00256   while(skipCols > 0 && rf.nextRow(words)) {
00257     skipCols--;
00258   }
00259   /* Make sure there is something after the skipped entries. */
00260   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00261     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00262   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00263     if(words[i] == colName) {
00264       if(colIx == npos) {
00265         colIx = i;
00266       }
00267       else {
00268         Verbose::out(1, "Warning: column name: " + ToStr(colName) + 
00269                 " occurs multiple times in: " + ToStr(fileName) + 
00270                 " using first column.");
00271       }
00272     }
00273   }
00274   /* Did we find a column with that name? */
00275   if(colIx == npos)
00276     return false;
00277   return columnFromRowFile(rf, colVec, colIx, unique);
00278 }
00279 
00291 bool TableFile::columnFromFile(const std::string& fileName,
00292                                std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00293                                unsigned int colIx, unsigned int skipCols, bool unique) {
00294   RowFile rf;
00295   vector<string> words;
00296   rf.open(fileName.c_str());
00297 
00298   /* Skip rows. */
00299   while(skipCols > 0 && rf.nextRow(words)) {
00300     skipCols--;
00301   }
00302   /* Make sure there is something there. */
00303   if(!(rf.nextRow(words)) || words.empty())
00304     Err::errAbort("Nothing after header in file: " + string(fileName));
00305   rf.reuseLine();
00306   return columnFromRowFile(rf, colVec, colIx, unique);
00307 }
00308 
00319 bool TableFile::columnFromRowFile(RowFile &rf, std::vector<std::string> &colVec, 
00320                                unsigned int colIx, bool unique) {
00321   map<string,bool> seen;
00322   vector<string> words;
00323   string fileName = rf.getFileName();
00324   /* Read entries. */
00325   while(rf.nextRow(words)) {
00326     if(colIx >= words.size()) {
00327       Err::errAbort("Trying to read column: " + ToStr(colIx) + " from row with only: " + 
00328                       ToStr(words.size()) + " columns at line: " + ToStr(rf.getCurrentLineNumber()) +
00329                       " in file: " + fileName);
00330     }
00331     if(unique) {
00332       if(seen.find(words[colIx]) != seen.end()) {
00333         Err::errAbort("Entry: '" + words[colIx] + "' has already been seen in file: " + 
00334                         fileName + " in column " + ToStr(colIx) + ".");
00335       }
00336       else {
00337         seen[words[colIx]] = true;
00338       }
00339     }
00340     colVec.push_back(words[colIx]);
00341   }
00342   return true;
00343 }
